math.alttext: P_{a\cup b}={\cal P}(\psi_{a\cup b})={\cal P}[\psi(a)+\psi(b)]\neq{\cal P}[% \psi(a)]+{\cal P}[\psi(b)],

m=\lim\limits_{\varepsilon\to 0}\sum_{i=1}^{N}\Delta n_{i}=\int_{t_{a}}^{t_{b}% }\!\!dn(t)=min.
